Values.CertificateSynchronization:CertificatesK: The key vault containing the certificates.
Values.CertificateSynchronization:ApimTenantId: The id of the tenant hosting APIM.
Values.CertificateSynchronization:ApimSpClientI: The client id of the service principal that can manage APIM.
